issue.title: System fails to run all of a sudden (on file that ran fine moments before) from seemingly outside (packages) cause.

content.raw: One addendum that may be related to the model failure and not necessarily the other distro issues.  Today, I received notice that Nate approved the ur10 model.  The model I was working was my version of the ur10.  I was using my model path preceding the gazebo model path, so I assume that it was trying to parse my local model.  However, it could be related if the gazebo_models ur10 was rolled out today; although, it did not appear in the available download list visible in gazebo so I discounted that as the issue in the earlier summary.
content.html: One addendum that may be related to the model failure and not necessarily the other distro issues. Today, I received notice that Nate approved the ur10 model. The model I was working was my version of the ur10. I was using my model path preceding the gazebo model path, so I assume that it was trying to parse my local model. However, it could be related if the gazebo_models ur10 was rolled out today; although, it did not appear in the available download list visible in gazebo so I discounted that as the issue in the earlier summary.
